programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: B.A.P.S
programme.desc: Two waitresses from Georgia fly to Los Angeles to audition for a music video. They want to start a business that combines soul food with a hair salon. They end up at the estate of an elderly millionaire. They bond with him and his butler.

programme.title: Woo
programme.desc: Friends arrange a blind date for a mismatched couple, an insecure law clerk (Tommy Davidson) and a sassy extrovert (Jada Pinkett Smith).

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey.

programme.title: Bright Road
programme.desc: A Southern schoolteacher (Dorothy Dandridge) pays special attention to her most rebellious fourth-grader (Philip Hepburn).

programme.title: A Patch of Blue
programme.desc: A blind white teenager (Elizabeth Hartman), sheltered by her sleazy mother (Shelley Winters), falls in love with a kind young black man (Sidney Poitier).

programme.title: To All My Friends on Shore
programme.desc: A working-class man (Bill Cosby) works hard for his family, then learns his son has sickle cell anemia.

programme.title: Sounder
programme.desc: A sharecropper's (Paul Winfield) wife (Cicely Tyson) keeps the family together after he goes to prison in 1930s Louisiana.

programme.title: Moving
programme.desc: A yuppie (Richard Pryor) loses his job in New Jersey and moves his wife (Beverly Todd) and family to Boise, Idaho.

programme.title: Lean on Me
programme.desc: Principal Joe Clark (Morgan Freeman) goes to bat against drugs, crime and bad grades in his Paterson, N.J., high school.

programme.title: Amos & Andrew
programme.desc: A car thief (Nicolas Cage) helps inept police (Dabney Coleman) when they overreact to reports of a burglar in the home of an author (Samuel L. Jackson) in an exclusive neighborhood.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: An escaped hit man (John Lithgow) seeks revenge on the policeman turned district attorney (Denzel Washington) who sent him to prison.

programme.title: Torque
programme.desc: Framed for murder by a drug dealer, a biker (Martin Henderson) must elude lawmen and the brother (Ice Cube) of the dead man.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guest hosts Full Force perform; guests include Taylor Dayne and comedian Charles Cozart.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guest host The Fat Boys perform; Guests: Pepsi and Shirlie, comedians Charles Cozart and Jeff Price.
